document.full_text: top-ranked caroline wozniacki defeated marion bartoli 6-1, 2-6, 6-3 to win the bnp paribas open a year after the dane lost in the final.
document.title: no. 1 wozniacki beats bartoli to win bnp paribas open
lines_and_colors: top-ranked caroline wozniacki defeated marion bartoli 6-1, 2-6, 6-3 to win the bnp paribas open a year after the dane lost in the final.
